name: Hacking-ArBot
description: Telegram bot made using Telethon which let you access telegram account using it's telethon string session. <Publicised now>

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based prototype.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based prototype.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

HANDLER.description: Custom command handler for sudo and dev users.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account'

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku app name here (Must an exact same name with your input above).

SUDO_USERS.description: ID of sudo users your bot. If you are dumb and would come and bother Gladiators support then keep the current ID's here as they are and add yours separated using space ' '.

DEV_USERS.description: ID of dev users your bot. If you are dumb and would come and bother Gladiators support then keep the current ID's here as they are and add yours separated using space ' '.
